title: Drawing Shapes
description: In this lab, we will learn how to draw various shapes using Matplotlib library in Python. Matplotlib is a plotting library for the Python programming language and its numerical mathematics extension NumPy. It provides an object-oriented API for embedding plots into applications using general-purpose GUI toolkits like Tkinter, wxPython, Qt, or GTK.
